forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
This morning, Downtown San Francisco greets the day with a refreshing clarity, as the sky emerges mostly clear. A gentle westerly breeze brushes past, carrying with it whispers of the ocean and hints of a chill that keeps things comfortable. The temperature rests comfortably in the low fifties, hinting at a delightful day ahead, where the sun will rise higher, offering its warmth through gentle rays, and coaxing the city towards a high near sixty-four. 

A subtle marine layer dances along the edges of the Golden Gate, but it should lift as the day unfurls, leaving a panorama of blue overhead. It’s an ideal time for a stroll along the Embarcadero or a leisurely visit to one of the many parks that dot the cityscape. Light layers will serve well today—a light sweater or a thin jacket—prepared for a spell of wind as it picks up throughout the afternoon. The city, vibrant with possibility, beckons you to savor a moment, perhaps indulging in an outdoor café or relishing the bustling life unfolding in front of you.
